purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the stock materials that are used to build composite materials. These stock materials are filament assemblies, braided and woven assemblies, isotropic and anisotropic materials, cores, and discontinuous fiber assemblies.

inscope.li: definition of the material stock of composite constituents;
items within the scope of application module Approval, ISO/TS 10303-1012;
items within the scope of application module Elemental geometric shape, ISO/TS 10303-1004;
items within the scope of application module Generic material aspects, ISO/TS 10303-1681;
items within the scope of application module Part view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1023;
items within the scope of application module Specification document, ISO/TS 10303-1747.

outscope.li: representation of composite material stock properties.

ae.refpath: product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category {product_category product_category.name = 'anisotropic material'}

product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category {product_category product_category.name = 'braided assembly'}
